amendment.description: To provide for an adjustment to committee allocations for wildfire suppression funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 434 proposed by Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S1868; text: CR S1868) To provide for an adjustment to committee allocations for wildfire suppression funding.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 434 proposed by Senator Wyden.
